text: Yu Lan (; 3 June 1921 – 28 June 2020) was a Chinese movie actress. In 1961, Yu won the award for Best Actress at the 2nd Moscow International Film Festival for her role in A Revolutionary Family.于蓝谈电影 People.com.cn August 24, 2009 She died in Beijing on 28 June 2020, aged 99. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese movie actors
title: Yu Lan
